Decscription: Unique name (with the |ENVIRONMENT|) for the farm
TZ to be used for all servers launched from this Farm. This is used for Lease Management and Database Backups (for Farm Roles using Database Built-in Automation)
If set this restricts access to the Farm to the named Teams, otherwise accessible to all Teams with access to the current |ENVIRONMENT|
Simultaneous : When Launching servers luanch all required at the same time |BR|Sequential: Wait until each server is running before launching the next server
